cards.name: Ainok Tracker
cards.text:
First strike
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"The ainok are wild dogs, not fit to join us around the fire."
—Surrak, the Hunt Caller

cards.name: Altar of the Brood
cards.text: Whenever another permanent enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: Supplicants offer flesh and silver, flowers and blood. The altar takes what it will, eyes gleaming with unspoken promises.

cards.name: Arashin War Beast
cards.text: Whenever Arashin War Beast deals combat damage to one or more blocking creatures, manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

cards.name: Arc Lightning
cards.text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

cards.name: Briber's Purse
cards.text:
Briber's Purse enters the battlefield with X gem counters on it.
{1}, {T}, Remove a gem counter from Briber's Purse: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
cards.flavor: The bigger the hand, the higher the price.

cards.name: Debilitating Injury
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
cards.flavor: Weakness exists within all who are not dragons.

cards.name: Dragonscale Boon
cards.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and untap it.
cards.flavor: Only those who have proved themselves worthy are granted a dragon's scale.

cards.name: Fierce Invocation
cards.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put two +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
cards.flavor: Anger can empower those who embrace it.

cards.name: Formless Nurturing
cards.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

cards.name: Ghostfire Blade
cards.flavor: If you fear the dragon's fire, you are unworthy to wield it.

cards.name: Grim Haruspex
cards.text:
Morph {B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Your enemies may be cowardly, my lord, but one should never call them gutless."

cards.name: Hewed Stone Retainers
cards.text: Cast Hewed Stone Retainers only if you've cast another spell this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Their origins are shrouded in mystery. I believe they are the protectors of the lost secrets of our world."
—Jilaya, Temur whisperer

cards.name: Jeering Instigator
cards.text:
Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Jeering Instigator is turned face up, if it's your turn, gain control of another target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Jeskai Infiltrator
cards.text:
Jeskai Infiltrator can't be blocked as long as you control no other creatures.
When Jeskai Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, exile it and the top card of your library in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

cards.name: Mastery of the Unseen
cards.text:
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
{3}{W}: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

cards.name: Mystic of the Hidden Way
cards.text:
Mystic of the Hidden Way can't be blocked.
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "There are many different paths. The Great Teacher reveals them all."

cards.name: Reality Shift
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of his or her library. (That player puts the top card of his or her library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)

cards.name: Ruthless Ripper
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Morph—Reveal a black card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Ruthless Ripper is turned face up, target player loses 2 life.

cards.name: Smite the Monstrous
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: The changing of a single moment in Tarkir's past altered its future, rewriting its history.

cards.name: Soul Summons
cards.text: Manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
cards.flavor: Ugin's magic reaches beyond the dragons. The clans have adapted it for war.

cards.name: Sultai Emissary
cards.text: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
cards.flavor: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.

cards.name: Ugin's Construct
cards.text: When Ugin's Construct enters the battlefield, sacrifice a permanent that's one or more colors.
cards.flavor: While trapping the Eldrazi on Zendikar, Ugin learned little from Sorin, but he gleaned the rudiments of lithomancy from Nahiri.

cards.name: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon
cards.text:
+2: Ugin, the Spirit Dragon deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
−X: Exile each permanent with converted mana cost X or less that's one or more colors.
−10: You gain 7 life, draw seven cards, then put up to seven permanent cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Watcher of the Roost
cards.text:
Flying
Morph—Reveal a white card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Watcher of the Roost is turned face up, you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Wildcall
cards.text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put X +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
cards.flavor: A howl on the wind hides many dangers.

cards.name: Write into Being
cards.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Manifest one of those cards, then put the other on the top or bottom of your library. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
